subject: feat: improve PWA install prompt visibility for all browsers
body:
- Added shouldShowInstall flag to always show install UI on mobile
- Added isMobile detection to usePWAInstall hook
- Updated PWABanner to show "How to Install" for all non-Chromium browsers
- Added comprehensive manual install instructions for:
  - Chrome on Android (menu â†’ Add to Home screen)
  - Chrome on iOS (redirect to Safari since WebKit required)
  - Safari on iOS/macOS
  - Firefox on mobile/desktop
  - Generic fallback for other browsers

Previously install banner only showed when beforeinstallprompt fired
(Chromium only), now it shows for all mobile browsers with manual
instructions.
